00032     class XmlError :public Exception {
00033     public:
00041       XmlError(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node,
00042               std::string const &msg) throw() 
00043        :Exception(std::string("On ")+
00044                  std::string(node.name(), 
00045                             node.name_size())+": "+msg) {}
00047       virtual ~XmlError() throw() {}
00048     }; // TREX::utils::FactoryException
00049     
00067     template<class Ty>
00068     Ty parse_attr(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node, 
00069                 std::string const &attr) {
00070       rapidxml::xml_attribute<> const *a = node.first_attribute(attr.c_str());
00071       if( NULL==a ) 
00072        throw XmlError(node, std::string("Unable to find attribute ")+attr);
00073       return string_cast<Ty>(std::string(a->value(), a->value_size()));
00074     }
00075 
00095     template<class Ty>
00096     Ty parse_attr(Ty const &on_missing, 
00097                 rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node, 
00098                 std::string const &attr) {
00099       rapidxml::xml_attribute<> const *a = node.first_attribute(attr.c_str());
00100       if( NULL==a )
00101        return on_missing;
00102       else 
00103        return string_cast<Ty>(std::string(a->value(), a->value_size()));
00104     }
00105 
00113     inline bool is_tag(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node,
00114                      std::string const &tag) {
00115       return 0==tag.compare(0, std::string::npos, 
00116                          node.name(), node.name_size());
00117     }

00131     class ext_iterator {
00132     public:
00135       typedef rapidxml::xml_node<>  value_type;
00138       typedef rapidxml::xml_node<> &reference;
00141       typedef rapidxml::xml_node<> *pointer;
00142

00147        :m_current(NULL), m_doc_root(NULL) {}
00153       ext_iterator(ext_iterator const &other)
00154        :m_external(other.m_external), m_current(other.m_current),
00155         m_file(other.m_file), m_doc(other.m_doc), 
00156         m_doc_root(other.m_doc_root) {}
00162       explicit ext_iterator(rapidxml::xml_node<> &node);
00183       ext_iterator(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node, std::string const &conf);
00185       ~ext_iterator() {}
00186 
00194       bool valid() const {
00195        return NULL!=m_current;
00196       }
00203       bool operator !() const {
00204        return !valid();
00205       }
00223       bool external() const {
00224        return valid() && m_external;
00225       }
00234       bool hasExternal() const {
00235        return NULL!=m_doc_root;
00236       }

00275        return *operator->();
00276       }

00299        return next();

00341 
00342     template<class Ty>
00343     Ty xml_conf_var(ext_iterator const &conf, std::string const &tag) {
00344       ext_iterator tmp(conf.find_tag(tag));
00345       if( !tmp )
00346        throw XmlError(*conf, "Unable to find tag \""+tag+"\".");
00347       return parse_attr<Ty>(*tmp, "value");
00348     }
00349 
00350     template<class Ty>
00351     Ty xml_conf_var(ext_iterator const &conf, std::string const &tag, 
00352                   Ty const &on_missing) {
00353       ext_iterator tmp(conf.find_tag(tag));
00354       if( !tmp )
00355        return on_missing;
00356       return parse_attr<Ty>(on_missing, *tmp, "value");
00357     }
